Body:
"""Inverse of Merge is a Split"""
graph_operation = GraphEditOperation.from_log_record(cg, FakeLogRecords.
    MERGE.record)
inverted_graph_operation = graph_operation.invert()
assert isinstance(inverted_graph_operation, SplitOperation)
assert np.all(np.equal(graph_operation.added_edges,
    inverted_graph_operation.removed_edges))
